name: enupishi
description:
ENUPISHI may contain disturbing imagery and content, play at your own risks. Story (物語)

It was a forbidden love, something that was against the rules of the game. One night, they decided to escape.  How far could they go?
それはゲームのルールに反する禁断の恋だった。ある夜、彼らは逃げることにしました。彼らはどこまで行くことができますか？

Controls (コントロール) [WASD] Walk [Mouse] Look[Space / Right Click] Interact/Continue Dialogue [SHIFT] Walk but faster Developer Note (開発者メモ)

I made this game over a week. I had this idea in my head for a month and needed to get it out.    

Join our discord and say hi!! :  https://discord.gg/ttJyGXTny4
